name: root
description: A monorepo for all npm packages in the Tasit ecosystem

scripts.clean:all: npx lerna run clean --stream && npx lerna clean --yes && rm -rf ./node_modules
scripts.publish: npm run clean:all && npm run bootstrap && npm test && npx lerna publish
scripts.ganache:start:forked-ropsten: npx ganache-cli --fork https://ropsten.infura.io --noVMErrorsOnRPCResponse true -m 'canal warfare equip auction crystal fossil helmet cash account joy inherit tank' --gasLimit 1000000000000 --host 0.0.0.0 > /dev/null 2>&1 &
scripts.ganache:start:forked-goerli: npx ganache-cli --fork https://goerli.infura.io/v3/974bd2e667b246f29d2589a59600530e --noVMErrorsOnRPCResponse true -m 'canal warfare equip auction crystal fossil helmet cash account joy inherit tank' --gasLimit 1000000000000 --host 0.0.0.0 > /dev/null 2>&1 &
scripts.ganache:start: npx ganache-cli --noVMErrorsOnRPCResponse true -m 'canal warfare equip auction crystal fossil helmet cash account joy inherit tank' --gasLimit 1000000000 --host 0.0.0.0 > ganache-cli.log &
scripts.ganache:stop: kill `ps ax|grep ganache-cli|grep -v grep| awk '{print $1}'` 2> /dev/null; exit 0
scripts.prepare:blockchain: npm run ganache:stop && npm run ganache:start && npm run truffle:migrate
scripts.pretest: npm run prepare:blockchain && npm run lint
scripts.start: npm run clean:all && npm run bootstrap && npm run prepare:blockchain

author: Tasit Labs
